description: Performing blocking operations on UI thread causing jank, frame drops, or ANR. Responsiveness critical issue.
solutions: Move blocking operations to background thread
Use callbacks or LiveData for results
Profile with Systrace to identify blocks
prevention: Use StrictMode to detect blocking calls
Use suspending functions instead of blocking
examples: // Bad: latch.await() // Good: launch(Dispatchers.IO) { latch.await(); withContext(Main) { update() } }
